name: Picnic (itch) (bananabreb)
description:
A Bitsy game where some animal friends prepare for a picnic. Use the WASD keys to navigate!

Made Using:

  • Bitsy by Adam Le Doux
  • bitsy-savior by aloelazoe
  • Borksy by ayolland

Music:

  • bird area background music: "Cottonwoods" by Blue Dot Sessions (licensed under CC BY-NC 4.0)
  • rabbit area background music: "Rabbit Hole" by Blue Dot Sessions (licensed under CC BY-NC 4.0)
  • fish area background music: "Gentle Sea Swell" by Daniel Birch (licensed under CC BY-NC 4.0)
  • picnic area background music: "Go to the Picnic" by Loyalty Freak Music (licensed under CC0 1.0)

This work is licensed under CC BY 4.0.
